title: European Film Academy Announces New Board Appointments - FilmNewEurope.com
snippet: Solomon is no newcomer to the Academy board, since she served for 6 years as deputy chair herself alongside outgoing chair Mike Downey, and was a regular board member before. Leontine Petit has been a regular board member since 2021.

title: European Film Academy announces new board appointments
snippet: Solomon has served on the Academy board for six years as deputy chair herself alongside outgoing chair Mike Downey, and was a regular board member before.

title: Romanian producer Ada Solomon elected chair of the European Film Academy board | Romania Insider
snippet: Dutch producer Leontine Petit and French producer Matthieu Darras were elected deputy chairs, and the new two-year leadership term will begin on January 1, 2026. The president of the Academy remains Juliette Binoche.
